Name: Babycar Driver
About the game: Meet Babycar Driver! This lovable and nimble character wants to see new places, learn new tricks and get himself into all sort of funny moments. Help him find his way through forests, cities, deserts and even the remote North. You can try different costumes designed especially for him and you can make his dreams come true: become a race car! Test your reflexes and skill by driving Babycar far and wide, jumping on platforms, collecting stars, medals and customizing his appearance. Features Endless runner, Canabalt-style platformer Variable gravity when jumping Randomly generated levels Parallax background scrolling for more depth Over 135,000 Babycars to build Pause system - everything will freeze and resume just the way you left it
